00034 #ifndef _XED_IMMED_H_
00035 # define _XED_IMMED_H_
00036 
00037 #include "xed-types.h"
00038 #include "xed-common-defs.h"
00039 #include "xed-util.h"
00040 
00041 XED_DLL_EXPORT xed_int64_t xed_immed_from_bytes(xed_int8_t* bytes, xed_uint_t n);
00042     /*
00043       Convert an array of bytes representing a Little Endian byte ordering
00044       of a number (11 22 33 44 55.. 88), in to a a 64b SIGNED number. That gets
00045       stored in memory in little endian format of course. 
00046 
00047       Input 11 22 33 44 55 66 77 88, 8
00048       Ouptut 0x8877665544332211  (stored in memory as (lsb) 11 22 33 44 55 66 77 88 (msb))
00049 
00050       Input f0, 1
00051       Output 0xffff_ffff_ffff_fff0  (stored in memory as f0 ff ff ff   ff ff ff ff)
00052 
00053       Input f0 00, 2
00054       Output 0x0000_0000_0000_00F0 (stored in memory a f0 00 00 00  00 00 00 00)
00055 
00056       Input 03, 1
00057       Output 0x0000_0000_0000_0030 (stored in memory a 30 00 00 00  00 00 00 00)
00058     */
00059 
00060 
00061 #endif
